trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for columns that can bind to a property in the data source of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fungerer som basisklassen for kolonner som kan bindes til en egenskap i datakilden for en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the binding that associates the column with a property in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir binding som knytter kolonnen med en egenskap i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: The Binding property allows a column to specify a property of the data grid's <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> to bind to.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen Binding kan en kolonne du vil angi en egenskap for datarutenettet <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>skal bindes til.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about binding paths, see the "Binding Path Syntax" section in [Binding Declarations Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om bindingen baner, kan du se "Binding banen syntaksen"-delen i [bindingen deklareringer oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The object that represents the data binding for the column.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som representerer databinding for kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the binding object to use when getting or setting cell content for the clipboard.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir binding-objektet som skal brukes når henter eller angir celleinnholdet for utklippstavlen.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the binding.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som representerer bindingen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style that is used when rendering the element that the column displays for a cell in editing mode.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir stilen som brukes ved gjengivelse av elementet kolonnen viser for en celle i modus for redigering.

trans-unit.source: The style that is used when rendering an editing element.
trans-unit.target: Stilen som brukes ved gjengivelse av et element for redigering.

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Registrerte standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hva kan påvirke verdien, kan du se <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.EditingElementStyle*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.EditingElementStyle*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.EditingElementStyle*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style that is used when rendering the element that the column displays for a cell that is not in editing mode.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir stilen som brukes ved gjengivelse av elementet kolonnen viser for en celle som ikke er i modus for redigering.

trans-unit.source: The style that is used when rendering a display-only element.
trans-unit.target: Stilen som brukes ved gjengivelse av en skrivebeskyttet visning elementet.

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Registrerte standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hva kan påvirke verdien, kan du se <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.ElementStyle*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.ElementStyle*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.ElementStyle*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Varsler den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"> </xref> når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding*>

trans-unit.source: The previous binding.
trans-unit.target: Den forrige bindingen.

trans-unit.source: The binding that the column has been changed to.
trans-unit.target: Binding som kolonnen er endret til.

trans-unit.source: Determines the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.IsReadOnly*> property based on property rules from the data grid that contains this column.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.IsReadOnly*>egenskapen basert på egenskapen regler fra datarutenett som inneholder denne kolonnen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.IsReadOnly*>

trans-unit.source: The value that was passed to the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som ble sendt til representanten.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if cells in the column cannot be edited based on rules from the data grid; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis cellene i kolonnen ikke kan redigeres basert på regler fra datarutenett; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Rebuilds the contents of a cell in the column in response to a binding change.
trans-unit.target: Bygger innholdet i en celle i kolonnen som svar på en endring i bindingen.

trans-unit.source: The cell to update.
trans-unit.target: Cellen for å oppdatere.

trans-unit.source: The name of the column property that has changed.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på column-egenskapen er endret.
